features: 💎【Large Capacity&Lightweight】Size: 7 x 3.5 x 15 inches /18 x 9 x 38 cm. The main compartment of the sling backpack can fit tablet or Ipad up to 12”. Bottle holder can fit the Diameter of water bottle up to 8.5cm(3 3/8 inches). The back Anti-theft Pocket can protect your valuables safe. The dimension of the cell phone strap pocket is L×W×H＝18cm×8.5cm×2.2cm, which can fit most plus smart phone.

💎【Hidden Earphone Hole&USB Charge Port】There is a hidden earphone hole on the front, providing easy access to your earphones, you can enjoy music anytime and anywhere. And the sling bag comes with a USB charging port great convenience for charging your electronic devices via connecting your own power bank (power bank not included), you can connect your phone to and easily charge during outdoors and travel, Very handy and fashionable, Hook up your phone and be on the go.

💎【High Quality Material】Shoulder bag for men women is made of high-quality nylon, waterproof, dirt-resistant, lighter and more easy to take care of. Shoulder backpack with excellent workmanship can show your outstanding temperament. Lightweight crossbody backpack bags sits nicely and freely on your back/chest and if this hiking bags for men gets durty, only just need wipe it off to stay it clean.

💎【Adjustable Reversible Shoulder Strap】Flexible satchel shoulder strap varied from 31 to maximum 39.5 inch can be adjusted loose or tight. Perfectly fit your body. Two ways of carrying: left or right. Relieve the pressure when you carry your bag for a long time. Can be used as messenger bag / shoulder bag / crossbody backpack / casual daypack / sling bag / chest bag / travel bag / working or business bag, suitable for office, outdoor, business and other occasions.

💎【After-sales guarantee】We always stand behind the quality of our product.If you have any problem with broken or damaged items you purchased，please do not hesitate to contact us with your order ID. We will reply and address your issue within one day, so please purchase with confidence.This item is not intended for use by children 12 and under

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for the money, descent size
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This backpack arrived in time and sealed with brand new with tags.I was amazed at the size of it for the price, it is a great bag worth every dollar. The material is strong and zippers are strong and secure the bag properly.I was able to store a Canon Rebel 3ti camera with a 200mm lens and a Canon AE1 as well, my wallet and my sunglasses case. The charging port worked perfectly fine and felt comfortable.The bag also came with an additional pocket on the sling where you can place other small items such as a wallet for example. The bag came with reflectors as well and it was easy to rotate from the back to the front giving you easy access to your items or simply to guard your belongings when walking on crowded areas.I was very satisfied with this purchase and it is definitely worth every dollar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bag is fantastic. It has enough space inside to be convenient, but not crowded. The kitchen sink will not fit inside. It also has a nice flap on the front, outside of the zipper, for quick and wasy access.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of room
reviews.reviewText: I actually ordered this for a diaper bag for short trips like the grocery store and such. Places where I don't need a huge diaper bag but just a few baby essentials and my wallet. This is perfect for that! I have lots of space to put a few diapers, a pack of wipes and then enough room for all of my stuff. I'm really happy with the purchase, it was exceptionally priced compared to others on the market. My only complaint is that the phone pocket is smaller than described. I thought my phone would fit no problem but I have to squeeze that puppy in there and then it won't zip all the way. Maybe with time and usage the material will loosen and have more give so I can zip it up. But that was the only thing I was upset about with this. It's really quite great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my best purchases ever. Value for money
reviews.reviewText: Great quality. Very handy . Pretty decent size. Nice cushion on the back. Highly recommend for 1 day treks or day hiking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bag going through the airport ever!
reviews.reviewText: I have had a few of these bags in the past. I mainly love them for when I have to fly. You can fit about everything in them and get through TSA quicker (and without as much wardrobe changing). This bag offers great organization for packing all your little stuff (I even had my ipad stored in securely). Everything that I normally carry in my pockets fit easily and where I could get to it quickly. I used it in the rain as well and it repelled water well. The area for the battery was ample and worked great for my battery recharger. The earphone hole is great for listening without the worry of messing through the pockets. Also it didn't leak at all (to those cutting this STOP! There is a slit in there to fish the wire through). The straps switched to different position making it comfortable even when loaded up. Definitely a favorite I will go back for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for work
reviews.reviewText: I work at a ministry so I’m constantly moving around the property completing different tasks, outside and inside. This bag is perfect for anyone on the move and has a very handy usb charging port that you can connect a battery bank to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Disney
reviews.reviewText: We never took them off. They are large enough to fit everything you need but small enough to not get in the way. Having our phone chargers with us were a must and this bag has a portal and cord for easy charging. I love the hidden pocket up ahainst my chest to slip my wallet in and out of. The key snap was a surprise, I use it always. Came home from a week at Disney and started using it as my everyday purse so I can be hands free. The strap is adjustable and the whole thing is just plain durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Student love bag.
reviews.reviewText: Help to eliminate student from carry paper in pockets.
